item.title: Every Major Movie & Show Version Of The Hulk, Ranked By Power Level
item.description: The Incredible Hulk is one of the strongest Marvel characters ever, yet the depiction of his threat-level across movies and television has varied.

item.title: It'll Break My Heart, But I Really Hope Fast & Furious 11 Doesn't Let Everyone Survive
item.description: While Fast & Furious is used to happy endings, the final movie needs to kill off some important characters despite how heartbreaking it will be.

item.title: Milly Alcock's DCU Hero Fights Multiple Villains In New Supergirl: Woman Of Tomorrow Set Video
item.description: A new Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow set video reveals Milly Alcock's DC Universe heroine fighting multiple villains in the upcoming DC Studios movie.
